messages.subject: Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference in Sept  2011
messages.msgSnippet: Just a reminder that the Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference will be held September 8-11, 2011 in Del Mar, San Diego, CA. Early bird registration ends May
messages.messageBody:
Just a reminder that the Good Vibrations Unschooling Conference will be held September 8-11, 2011 in Del Mar, San Diego, CA. Early bird registration ends May 31st. This year's conference includes Sandra Dodd, Holly Dodd, Phil Biegler, Blake Boles and several more! It's held at the beautiful Doubletree Hotel just minutes from beautiful Torrey Pines Beach. Wonderful place to spend your vacation and go to an unschooling conference. Be sure to register and get a special great rate on a room at the Doubletree soon!

The conference website can be found here:


http://goodvibrationsconference.com/



Mandy Sicard
